SEARCH
Package Util.FxmlNavigator

Class FxmlNavigator

java.lang.Object
Util.FxmlNavigator.FxmlNavigator
@Component public class FxmlNavigator extends Object
Handles navigation between different FXML views in the application.

Provides methods to switch scenes, open new windows, and handle logout transitions.

    • navigateTo

      public void navigateTo(javafx.stage.Stage stage, String fxmlPath, String title)
      Navigates to a given FXML file in the current stage.
      Parameters:
      stage - the target stage
      fxmlPath - the path to the FXML file
      title - the window title

    • logout

      public void logout(javafx.stage.Stage stage, String loginFxmlPath)
      Logs out by navigating back to the login screen.
      Parameters:
      stage - the current stage
      loginFxmlPath - path to the login FXML file

    • openInNewWindow

      public <T> T openInNewWindow(String fxmlPath, String title)
      Opens a new window with the given FXML view.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the controller type
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - the FXML file path
      title - the window title
      Returns:
      the controller of the loaded FXML, or null if loading fails
